# Testing owl:propertyDisjointWith (prp-pdw)  

PREFIX bbc:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/bbc/>  
PREFIX rdf:<http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> 
PREFIX owl:<http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX xsd:<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
PREFIX core:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/coreconcepts/> 
PREFIX cwork:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/creativework/> 
PREFIX ldbc:<http://www.ldbc.eu/ontologies/sempub#>

INSERT DATA {
  <http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/creativework-prp-pdw-constraint#id> a cwork:NewsItem ;
    cwork:title "Constraint Violation test for owl:propertyDisjointWith (prp-pdw)" ;
    rdf:type cwork:CreativeWork ; 
    core:facebook <http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/creativework-prp-pdw-webdocument-1> ;
    core:twitter <http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/creativework-prp-pdw-webdocument-1> .

	bbc:webDocumentType bbc:HighWeb . 
}
